titleInfo.title: Gender as class in competitve sports: the different meaning of gender in top-level sport

bibliographicCitation.wels: Müller, M. (2008): Gender as class in competitve sports: the different meaning of gender in top-level sport. In: Dieter H. Jütting; Bernd Schulze; Ulrike Müller (Hrsg.): Local Sport in Europe. Münster: Waxmann. (Edition global-lokale Sportkultur, 35). S. 196-201.
